participant_1.name: Sophia
participant_1.personality: Sophia is enthusiastic and enjoys the finer things in life. She is determined and has a passion for fashion and luxury.
participant_1.background: i currently work for a watch dealer. my family does not support my career choices. i often shop for shoes and watches. i like shopping. my dream car is a rolls royce ghost.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Jake is friendly and laid back, with a love for outdoor activities and a strong sense of community.
participant_2.background: i've a german shepherd dog. i live in a rural farming community. my husband is adopted. i like to watch nhl hockey.
